item.title: I need help very fast plz about runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @cradle143 cradle143
item.description:
@cradle143 wrote:

[quote=“outrageouscape, post:2, topic:387183”][quote author=cradle143 link=topic=482983.msg3537187#msg3537187 date=1300632711]
edit:::i found in src/server/cong i think it’s xp it is?

/**
* Skill Experience Multipliers
*/
public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int MINING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int SMITHING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FARMING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FISHING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int AGILITY_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int PRAYER_EXPERIENCE = 10;
public static final int RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 10;
public static final int CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int THIEVING_EXPERIENCE = 10;
public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int COOKING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
}
[/quote]

Your correct.[/quote]ok i changed it but nothing happen my xp still at the same rate… does i have to change something else to make the xp rate faster???
like to go on the rc file then change xp for each rune?

item.title: I need help very fast plz about runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @cradle143 cradle143
item.description:
@cradle143 wrote:

hello i need help with something how where i can add altar for runcrafthing because when i tele to air altar there is no altar to craft

air=no alter
cosmic=no alter
mind= when i tele to mind te tele coords or not good how can i change it?
water= no alter
earth= work
fire=tele me to the mind alter
body =work good
nature=work good
law = work well
death=work good
blood=when i click on blood it do astral rune and when i click blood it do blood? and don’t tele to an altar it craft it automaticly??

plz help me and btw if you can tell me how to change the xp rate of runecrafthing i would love it because it’s way too slow ty

edit:::i found in src/server/cong i think it’s xp it is?

/**
* Skill Experience Multipliers
*/
public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int MINING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int SMITHING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FARMING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FISHING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int AGILITY_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int PRAYER_EXPERIENCE = 10;
public static final int RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 10;
public static final int CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int THIEVING_EXPERIENCE = 10;
public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int COOKING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
public static final int FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE = 5;
}
